admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund:
TF021251-PHRD-JAPANESE CTF (USD ACCOUNT),TF036406-CAMBODIA - TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE PROJECT,TF033949-RWANDA - DEMOBILIZATION,
            REINTEGRATION AND RECONCILIATION PROGRAM,TF033591-CAMBODIA - VETERANS ASSISTANCE PROGRAM,TF025186-PHRD-ECONOMIC REHABILITATION PROJECT,TF025995-EMERGENCY REHABILITATION PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The overall objective of the Technical
            Assistance Project is to assist Cambodia's transition
            to a market economy by helping to implement the
            Government's economic reform program.  This will be
            done, first, by strengthening the economic mamangement team
            and, second, by helping put in place the foundations for an
            environment conducive to private sector development.  To
            achieve those objectives, IDA Credit financing will be made
            available to mobilize consultants' services, prepare
            and implement training programs, and provide equipment and
            works in support of the Government's policies to be
            carried out in the following areas: 1) public expenditure
            control; 2) public investment management; 3) foreign debt
            management; 4) public sector personnel management; and 5)
            private sector development.
